comment._content: Godfroy Langlois (1866-1926), French-Canadian journalist and legislator: fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godfroy_Langlois

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an English version in Wikipedia for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godfroy_Langlois

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1913 Langlois, editor of the Montreal newspaper Le Pays, caused a stir in French Canada with a report on inadequacies of the educational system, reporting that many female schoolteachers received payment of only 20 pounds a year. Langlois demanded a system of normal colleges to train teachers.
